subject: Re: Order #SSN4424, how did it go?
description_text: Der Artikel ist noch nicht angekommen Von meinem iPhone gesendet Am 25.12.2025 um 16:14 schrieb SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io>: ﻿ Hello Stefan, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello Stefan, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) Dislike it Love it! Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi Stefan Windhagauer,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2535100706109111

Yes, finally it is mounted and works properly 
Von meinem iPhone gesendet

Hi Stefan Windhagauer,  Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
